func.title: Find_Func
func.desc: Search criterion: finds all objects which return true to a call of the specified function. If the function is defined locally, the local function will be called, otherwiese a global function.
func.remark: Warning: never use this with a function which might have side effects. If your function may have side effects, do not use Find_Func but walk through the list of found objects instead.
For additional information on the use of this function see FindObjects.

example.text: Returns all clonks of any types (all clonks that return true on the call IsClonk).
